title: Apple Music beta for Android references unreleased Apple Classical app
content:
Last year, Apple acquired Primephonic to further improve its classical catalogue on its music streaming service. The company promised that it would launch a separate app –focused on classical music — in early 2022, as it shut Primephonic down. While the Cupertino tech giant didn’t share a specific date to when the app might arrive,

The post Apple Music beta for Android references unreleased Apple Classical app appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest beta version of the Apple Music app on Android references the unreleased Apple Classical app. It's unclear when it'll launch.
